#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
#include<limits>
#include <stdio.h>
#include<set>
#include<string.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<queue>
#define ll long long
#define INF 10005
using namespace std;
vector <ll> v[100003];
ll visited[100003];
ll cost[100003];

ll bfs(ll i)
{ll mi=cost[i];
	queue <ll> q;
	q.push(i);
	visited[i]=1;

	while(!q.empty())
	{
		ll k=q.front();
		q.pop();
		for(ll j=0;j<v[k].size();j++)
		{
			if(visited[v[k][j]]==0)
			{mi=min(mi,cost[v[k][j]]);
				q.push(v[k][j]);
				visited[v[k][j]]=1;


			}

		}
	}
	return mi;
}
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {ll n,m,c1,c2,i;
    ll s=0;
        scanf("%lld %lld",&n,&m);
      for(i=1;i<=n;++i)
        scanf("%lld",&cost[i]);
       for(i=0;i<m;++i)
       {scanf("%lld %lld",&c1,&c2);
           v[c1].push_back(c2);
           v[c2].push_back(c1);
       }
       for(i=1;i<=n;++i)
        {
        if(!visited[i])
          {ll res=bfs(i);
            if(res!=INF)
               {s+=res;
               /*cout<<res<<'\n';
               cout<<s<<'\n';*/
               }
            else
              {s+=cost[i];
              /*cout<<res<<'\n';
               cout<<s<<'\n';*/
              }

          }
        }
        printf("%lld\n",s);
        for(i=0;i<=n;++i)
        v[i].clear();
        memset(visited,0,sizeof(visited));
    }
}
